item.title: Protection
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: Protect & thrive! Protection — from wind, frost, sun & predators Wind Windbreak hedge Nurse tree Dead hedge Wind & cold Potting shed Greenhouse Polytunnel Cold frames Heated propagation bed Protect some young plants from direct sun Protect young plants from drying out Protect from weed competition Protect from predators Note: will be updating this page with examples & photos

item.title: Windbreak hedges for an exposed coastal site
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: At last Saturday’s pruning workshop by The People’s Orchard I was talking with some people from Fishguard.
